source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: A workflow to create realistic material in Blender.
items.headline: The decay of one good looking lantern.
objectives_summary: This course will go through how you create a realistic material using different techniques in Blender to mask out things like edges, places to get dirt and dust on.

items.title: Let's Create Explosion in Maya & Composite in Nuke
items.headline: You Will Create Realistic Explosion in Maya & Composite in Nuke Fully in Real Time.
objectives_summary: You Will Learn To Create Advanced Explosion By Using Maya Fluid
You Will Learn To Create Advanced Passes Creation By Using Custom AOVs Technique in Maya
You Will Learn To Create Advanced Compositing By Using Nuke

items.title: Parametric Twisted Forms and w/ Rhino & Grasshopper
items.headline: How to create Twisted Forms with Rhino and Grasshopper
objectives_summary: How to use Grasshopper for Rhino

items.title: Illustrate a Dystopian City, Painting Techniques + Cinema 4D
items.headline: A beginner to intermediate course covering the creative and technical steps of combining traditional and 3D illustration
objectives_summary: How to combine traditional art techniques with 3D.

items.title: Solidworks Surface Design-Project Oriented Training
items.headline: Project Based Training on Solidworks Surface Design
objectives_summary: How to read drawing and make the part using solid works surface design workbench

items.title: Create Cinematic Loops in Cinema 4D & After Effects
items.headline: Create a space animation in Cinema 4D and also make it look. Learn various tools & techniques, lighting & rendering

items.title: Full Nuke Compositing Course | Mastering To CG Integration
items.headline: Perfect Class For Becoming CG VFX Compositor
objectives_summary: You’ll be creating disintegrating and gold revealing effects using the techniques from this class.
Even if you’re new to compositing or Nuke, you’ll find these simple and effective techniques easy to use and apply to your project.

items.title: Create and animate a 'Stick Man' in Adobe After Effects
items.headline: End-to-end tutorial in Adobe After Effects, creating and making the basic animation of a 'stick-man'
objectives_summary: You will learn the 'parent-child' principle when creating animation in After Effects

items.title: Tank firing in Houdini
items.headline: Houdini pyro and volumes
objectives_summary: firing effect from a tank in Houdini using pyro

items.title: Pack starter After Effects Animate Character Animator
items.headline: Get started with animations with the basics of Adobe After Effects Adobe Animate and Adobe Character Animator

items.title: Zbrush - Sculpting Stylized Characters
items.headline: Learn to sculpt stylized characters! We will cover basic Anatomy, Hair, Clothing, and Armor as well in this course!
objectives_summary: Basic anatomy and proportions for character creation
Analyzing reference and what to look for

items.title: Become Flash Multimedia Animation Expert
items.headline: This module will teach you how we can use flash tools and techniques for 2D Multimedia Animation.
objectives_summary: The 2D Multimedia Animation module by Aroha Media is a serious step in professional training. These modules provide step by step instructions for extensive use of flash for Multimedia. The content that is covered in these modules is especially designed from and employment perspective considering the requirements of the industry today. This will help serious students not only get an insight into what potential employers look for but also guide them to develop their basic skills to meet the entry level requirements of the industry. Overall, these modules if seriously studied will help students build a very strong understanding of the basics of the 2D digital media. And all this is available at a delightfully affordable price. Aroha’s best wishes to all the students who aspire to work in this media. Wish you a great future ahead!

items.title: Texturing 3D Lettering in Adobe After Effects | Part 2 of 3
items.headline: A Three Part Series of Creating 3D Animated Lettering That Stands Out And Enhances Your Online Presence
objectives_summary: Texturing 3D Objects in Adobe After Effects
